title: OPL semis
body: So I maybe wrong but I thought when it comes to the final four that in the team standings that 1 v 4 and 2 v 3. That's not the case now though? Why would Dire wolves not v Avant Garde and Chiefs v Legacy? This seems a bit suss, but as I said I maybe incorrect.

replies.body:
Umm... it is 1v4 and 2v3...

DW and Legacy tied for first place, so had a 1 game tiebreaker to see who claimed #1 spot. Legacy did.

Chiefs finished outright 3rd, so they play DW. 

AV/TM/SIN all finished equal 4th so had a three-way tiebreaker to see who made playoffs. AV won.

So the final standings were

1 - Legacy
2 - DireWolves
3 - Chiefs
4 - AvantGarde

Which gives us Legacy v AvantGarde (1v4) and DireWoves v Chiefs (2v3).

Simples!
Yes this is correct. Our website which is new to the second split wasn't quite ready to deal with a three way tie (who is?) which is why it wasn't super clear.
It's probably to do with the tiebreakers that happened.
